name: Sliding Samuel
description:
Sliding Samuel

This is my first Unity game &  C# game, you play as a cube called  Samuel and have to dodge the oncoming objects and make it to the finish line in one piece with crashing into the blocks. Complete the 5 levels that slowly getting more and more difficult. 

Controls
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
ESC - Pause 

Scenes
- Main Menu
- Level 1
- Level 2
- Level 3
- Level 4
- Level 5
- Credits

The following game was made by following the tutorial made by Brackeys (Link can be found to the tutorial playlist below)

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL
